Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Trump tweeted that the Supreme Court should decide the presidency at every election.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence of the tweet existing on any of President Trump's verified accounts or associated accounts.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump tweeted the statement without providing any evidence to support it.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the tweet is fake and was generated using tweet generators, as websites allow anyone to create real-looking but ultimately fake tweets.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim understates any information.
